items.sentence: I do hope you haven\'t done anything stupid.
I don\'t allow my children to eat ice cream.
Tom and Mary are both reading the same book.
Tom and Mary are leaving Boston next Monday.
I still don\'t know what you want me to buy.
It\'s quite likely that Tom won\'t be there.
I know that you were in Boston last weekend.
Tom would\'ve stayed longer if he could\'ve.
That was the only thing that I needed to do.
What\'s your favorite thing to do in Boston?
I\'m not going to tell Tom how much I weigh.
I\'m not sure Tom is going to agree to this.
Tom was paid thirty dollars for what he did.
Tom needed to be told to do that by himself.
Tom needs to be told not to do that anymore.
Tom needs to be told that he should do that.
Maybe we just weren\'t meant to be together.
You have to tell Tom. If you don\'t, I will.
Let\'s focus on what needs to be done today.
Tom says he\'s considering quitting his job.
